wikipedia_page.main: Oliver Nicholas Anthony Dillon (born 11 April 1998) is an English actor. He is best known for his role as Huffty in the CBeebies shows Raa Raa the Noisy Lion since 2011-2018 and Waybuloo. Dillon also voiced Lumpy the Heffalump in My Friends Tigger & Pooh airing on Playhouse Disney Channel.

response: He is voiced by Kyle Stanger in the films, by Oliver Dillon in My Friends Tigger & Pooh, and by Amelia Stanger in Kingdom Hearts III.
* Oliver Dillon as Lumpy the Heffalump

link_mentions.page: Tigger & Pooh and a Musical Too

response: * Nok Tok: Nok Tok is the first Pipling, a bear. He has a turquoise blue-colored body. He has a short tuft on top of his head and wears a light yellow T-shirt. He has a small tail and pretty brown eyes. Nok Tok is the practical one who enjoys fixing and building things. He is best friends with De Li. He is voiced by Oliver Dillon.

*Hufty (voiced by Oliver Dillon): An elephant who loves music and giving his friends a ride on his train.
